revised_title: Anisotropy and Field Dependence of Magneto-Resistance in Aluminium
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on the magneto-resistance of aluminium at low temperatures and in magnetic fields up to 20. They found that neither saturation nor quadratic variation with field was observed in any orientation. The anisotropy of magneto-resistance was small but showed a consistent pattern. The results could not be explained by Harrison's four orthogonal plane wave model of the aluminium Fermi surface but could be explained by a slightly different Fermi surface model.
